prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If no candidate fits, set selected_product_id to null and explain in package_notes.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json

    ]
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "One-Pan BBQ Chickpea Spinach Melt on Toast",
  "description": "A quick, mild, plant-forward toast melt with BBQ chickpeas, spinach, and cheddar, all done in one pan. Fast and satisfying for solo weeknights.",
  "servings": "Single portion",
  "prep_steps": [
    "Drain and rinse chickpeas.",
    "Finely chop red onion.",
    "Grate cheddar cheese.",
    "Rinse and pat dry spinach.",
    "Measure BBQ sauce.",
    "Preheat a nonstick pan on medium heat."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "Add olive oil to the pan; cook red onion 1–2 minutes until softened.",
    "Add chickpeas and BBQ sauce; mash lightly with a spatula and heat 2–3 minutes until warmed through. Season with salt and pepper. Push mixture to one side of the pan.",
    "Place both bread slices in the empty side of the pan; toast 1–2 minutes per side until lightly golden.",
    "Top one slice with the warm BBQ chickpeas, then add spinach and cheddar cheese.",
    "Cover the pan and lower heat; cook 2–3 minutes until the cheese melts.",
    "Place the second toast slice on top, press gently, then remove and serve."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "chickpeas",
      "quantity": "1/2 cup",
      "preparation": "drained and rinsed"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "red onion",
      "quantity": "2 tablespoons",
      "preparation": "finely chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "BBQ sauce",
      "quantity": "1 1/2 tablespoons"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "spinach",
      "quantity": "1 cup",
      "preparation": "roughly chopped"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "cheddar cheese",
      "quantity": "1/3 cup",
      "preparation": "grated"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "bread",
      "quantity": "2 slices"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "olive oil",
      "quantity": "1 teaspoon"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salt and pepper",
      "quantity": "to taste"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "Diet": [
      "Flexitarian"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "ModernAmerican",
      "SouthAfrican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "Under15"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "Dairy",
      "Gluten"
    ],
    "BudgetLevel": [
      "ValueStaples"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Solo"
    ],
    "CuisineOpenness": [
      "FamiliarClassics"
    ]
  }
}
        ```

